Reviews.Title: I have NEVER experienced WORSE customer service in my life
Reviews.Author: Paul DeLucia
Reviews.Content: Ordered a Seiki product and after 9 months, the audio/visual ports stopped working. We contacted the company and after talking to a tech support rep, we instructed to ship it back to them (at our own expense) and they would ship us a new one because our malfunctioning unit was still under their "great" 1 year warranty.We shipped it to their location in Mississippi (at a personal cost of $120) We were initially instructed to email the tracking number to the rep we had originally spoken with to speed up the process of them shipping us the new one. We shipped out the originally TV on Nov. 20th.  We never received any confirmation that they had received the number or later the product until we called 2 weeks later. After being on hold for 30+min on several occasions (most times we were sent to voice-mail) we were told everything was in line to ship and to expect our new TV within 7-14 business days. After two more weeks, we called back. still no TV. we were told that they no longer made our model and we would have to wait until a refurbished model was available. Already having waited a month for this replacement, we refused to accept this and finally got a supervisor to approve an upgrade to the next size up. We have since been waiting for the replacement, approaching two months now. Every time we have called, we are told its waiting to be shipped or they are backed up and it will take up to 5 weeks to ship or their warehouse is out of stock. Every time a new story. We are out several hundred dollars between the initial purchase of this TV along with shipping it back. I would NEVER recommend anyone purchase anything from Seiki, they are incompetence and disregard for their customers incarnate.

Reviews.Title: Broken after 40 days
Reviews.Author: CRD
Reviews.Content: Power supply board began sparking and burning 40 days after ownership, and after only being used a handful of times.  Very poor quality.  It was a cheap tv, but I was sure hoping it would last longer than this.

Reviews.Title: DOA
Reviews.Author: jariyakariya
Reviews.Content: It does not power on.It has a bare-bones style to it.Can't review performance because it didn't power on.I will replace it with slightly more expensive unit.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good.
Reviews.Author: J. Mccoy
Reviews.Content: For $179, you cant beat it. Sound is good, picture is pretty good. There is a lag between changing channels, you see blue screen for a couple of seconds. The remote is cheap. But @179, it was a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: april
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price! Picture quality is good and it arrived rather quickly. This was my first time purchasing this brand.

Reviews.Title: Chunky But Great Value!
Reviews.Author: SID
Reviews.Content: In my home I opted for top of the line, Ultraslim Samsung LED TVs.  They are sleek and beautiful on the wall, but have some quality issues, and most of all, they're expensive!  For my office and for my sister's house, I didn't want to spend as much, where picture quality and design wasn't as important.  It was a pleasant surprise that the two Seiki TVs I bought at really, really, really low prices, had excellent picture quality, even if the frame feels chunky and cheap.  It doesn't even actually look too cheap, but it feels it, and if you're looking from the side, you can see the bottom is quite thick.

Reviews.Title: Didn't Work Out for Me...
Reviews.Author: Book Lover
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV on January 28th, after reading the reviews, most of which were favorable. I was just looking for an inexpensive TV for my bedroom so I did not care that the one bad review said it was light weight and cheap. The price was good ($47 less than it is listed for now!) and I figured as long as it lasted a few years that is all I cared about. After all, I was only going to be watching it for about an hour per night while I was in bed. However, on February 12th, I went to turn it on and 1/2 of the screen was black. Within a half hour, the entire screen was black. Since I had it less than 30 days returning it wasn't a problem and I consider myself lucky to have dodged a bullet.If the TV had not broken, it would have been fine. The picture was good and it suited my needs.

Reviews.Title: Buy it now
Reviews.Author: James R. Norton Sr.
Reviews.Content: Great picture, low price, and easy to set up and works well with Direct TVNow I have to come up with more words to post the review.

Reviews.Title: my family loved this tv
Reviews.Author: daniel von ruden
Reviews.Content: my family was very happy with this tv easy to set up and program this Is great and we love this tv

Reviews.Title: Great pictures
Reviews.Author: Danny S Thomas
Reviews.Content: I bought to put in my garage it is a nice tv and it serves the purpose for what I use it far.

Reviews.Title: Package came with NO manual, NO warranty card,Color is questionable
Reviews.Author: Ronald W. Kilgore
Reviews.Content: Loved the price but this appears to fall in the category of 'too good to be true' After several attempts to properly balance color we gave up. The picture looks like a kid's coloring book.

Reviews.Title: Seiki Rarting and Amazon as well.
Reviews.Author: Paul Albright
Reviews.Content: I purchased (2) at the same time, one out of the box worked as specified and one had display issues.  The boxes were not damaged when they arrived but since they were shipped over the road that could be suspect.  Called to get a replacement  but only (1) refurbished was available little disappointed about that  but the Amazon associate responded without me asking and offered a full credit since the items were both new. I really hate to return anything but that was pretty painless because we have UPS and FedEx delivery daily at our office.  Just wish they had a replacement I like the 32 because it can be shipped back and forth for repair and does not require an onsite visit like larger TV’s.  When you have a vacation home the ability to freight it back makes it very easy to manage.  My 2 star rating was based on this (1) worked out of the box (2) stars – (1) did not (-2) stars and no available replacement (-1) star…did not ask about Amazon but great experience.  Regards, Paul.

Reviews.Title: Completely satisfied
Reviews.Author: Jasmyn Melendez
Reviews.Content: Since i bought this tv over two months ago, i have had no problems with it and am entirely happy with it.

Reviews.Title: good pic, good price, delivered on time
Reviews.Author: James B.
Reviews.Content: up close you can tell it is only 720p, but it is still a nice tv.  i also like the multiple hd inputs this unit has.  it is now my primary HDTV and is also hooked up to my gaming PC (this required an adapter cable to connect to my computer's video out but it works great with awesome resolution).i have not noted any dead or bright pixels, so i am very pleased with the picture.i would have liked the tv to come with at least a little "tilt" in the stand; i had to cut and drill a piece of 1x2 pine to give it about a 5 degree upward tilt as it sits (in my application) at desk level.  like i said, it replaced my gaming computer's monitor too - quite immersive (sp?)i would recommend this to anyone needing a multi-use monitor/tv with good resolution.

Reviews.Title: Good qulity for a good price
Reviews.Author: Josh Beebe
Reviews.Content: I am quite pleased with this TV my wife and I are gamers and this TV works great for her. She also has her laptop hooked up to it though the VGA port. Compared to some flat screens the sound on the Seiki is great even for those pesky shows with random high and low sounds at level 7 she is able to easily watch any show while I am playing video games. Only down side is while playing on her PS3 she noticed it seems to look a little faded in color we played around with the contrast and brightness and it did help but never truly fix the problem.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: SUSAN SCHULTZ "Susan"
Reviews.Content: By reading the reviews and researching this set is what was needed for me. Has been working great and doing well. Price is well within budget for a second set.

Reviews.Title: Seiki 32 inch television. Flat screen HD  720p slim design black. Can be wall mounted
Reviews.Author: Fred W. Middleton "Musicfm"
Reviews.Content: It was an unbelievable deal on a cheap tv the picture quality is great I googled several web sites and decided amazon was the best choice

Reviews.Title: Excellent LCD Flatscreen for less than 200.00!
Reviews.Author: Tech808
Reviews.Content: I was originally looking at a Sony SmartTV LCD 720p flatscreen for about 350.00 refurbished -- until I saw this one new for 199.99.  I've never looked back.  Does everything the Sony does and has such a small footprint, I've been very satisfied.  Excellent picture - and easily switches modes by remote for 'wide screen' movies.  Netflix never looked so good (HDMI cable not included)  5-stars, Seiki!

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good Product
Reviews.Author: Aisha Burton
Reviews.Content: Just as advertised. Great quality and sound for the price. It was a great upgrade for me and so far I'm satisfied with the product.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: I was actually surprised when this TV came. It was a gift for my sister. She needed a new tv and at 171$ you cant beat that for a 32" tv. Picture quality was bad until we put an HDMI cable from the satellite receiver and WOW, just as nice as my Vizio!Well worth the investment!Only complaint is the stupid Energy Star Sticker left all kinds of residue on the front  of the tv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: dean
Reviews.Content: Great TV.  The picture quality is great.  My child stay in her room now and I just call her to come and eat.
